title: Recognition Experiences of Women of Color in Chemistry: An Intersectional Study
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3RP00278K, Paper
Norda Simone Stephenson, Ursula Abelsen
Much research on women of color in STEM has treated women of color as a collective, giving little attention to the nuanced differences in the experiences of the women within...
